name: FlashAlert
0:
”Alexa, open Flash Alert”
”News about MSFT”
”Today's news on MSFT”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flash alert
Developer Terms of Use
des:
FlashAlert is your personal low-latency service for latest SEC filings, PR News releases, upgrades and downgrades covering about 13,000 publicly traded U.S. companies. If your company trades on NASDAQ, NYSE, AMEX, OTC or Pink Sheets – we got you covered around the clock!

You can link your flashalert.me account to receive fresh news about your stock, you need to go to settings of Flash Alert skill and link your account, then you could just say: "News about my portfolio".
